name: Sylvan Pineaneer
text: You can Special Summon this card from your hand by discarding 1 other Plant-Type monster. You can only Special Summon "Sylvan Pineaneer" by this effect once per turn. You can tribute this card on the field: excavate the top card of your Deck, and if it is a Plant-Type monster, send it to the Graveyard. If this card is excavated from the Deck and sent to the Graveyard by a card effect: during your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon/Set 1 Plant-Type monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)
